Name: Tower of the Alchemist
About the game: This is an action role-playing game that requires strategy. In this game, you not only need to defeat the enemy through instant combat, but also need to plan routes and other strategies to deal with strong enemies. By acquiring props and equipment, overcoming all the powerful enemies on the road, the target defeats the devil.
